intro: Chytroma miersii, commonly known as the Miers' chytroma, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endemic species within its range.
